avgFunctionWordsPerSentence() - Method in class at.ac.uibk.dbis.textfeatures.features.SyntacticalFeatures
Calculates average function words per sentence Function words are e.g
prepositions, pronouns, auxiliary verbs, conjunctions, grammatical articles or particles.
avgSyllablesPerSentence() - Method in class at.ac.uibk.dbis.textfeatures.features.LexicalFeatures
Calculates the average number of syllables per sentence.
avgWordFrequencyClass() - Method in class at.ac.uibk.dbis.textfeatures.features.LexicalFeatures
Calculates Average Word Frequency Class
Formula:
"Let C be a text corpus, and let |C| be the number of words in C.
Moreover, let f(w) denote the frequency of a word w âˆˆ C, and let r(w)
denote the rank of w in a word list of C, which is sorted by decreasing
frequency.
avgWordLength() - Method in class at.ac.uibk.dbis.textfeatures.features.LexicalFeatures
Calculates the average word length.
Formula:
a = sum of all word lenghts
b = textlength in words
a / b
avgWordsPerSentence() - Method in class at.ac.uibk.dbis.textfeatures.features.LexicalFeatures
Calculates the average number of words per sentence
Formula:
a = textlength in words
b = textlength in sentences
a / b
